message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you 10%.  Let's see if we can find a better split for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. Your turn to improve on this offer.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it 60/40.  This is a fair offer considering the inflation.
I think I can do better than 40% for myself. Your turn to counter.
I'm still willing to negotiate.  Let's try a 45/55 split. This is a fair offer considering the inflation and I'm sure we can find a solution that benefits us both.
I'm getting closer to my target. You're running out of room to negotiate. Make a better offer or I'll take this.
I'm trying to be reasonable, but I can't go lower than 30%.  This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
